name: Scrum-Platform
description: A Platform for learning about the Agile Methodology : Scrum. This project didn't have much in the way of a back-end as it was a simple website for learning scrum having most of it work and dedication on the front-end

scrum_master.description: Scrum Master for the later 3 Sprints of the Project, worked mainly on the styling and responsivity of the site,vercel deployement and also responsible for the forms and some translations.

product_owner.description: Product Owner for all of the project, focused on organizing the project and also working on the front-end of the site

VFF.description: Worked on the Dark-Mode also responsible for translation of the website

MAR.description: Responsible for working on the Backlog,Product Owner pages and for a visibility pass on the text for better reading experience

JAS.description: Worked on the Icon of the project and Tutorial,Glossary pages
